mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_oem_info ( dealer_id, brand_name, wechat_name, wechat_code, app_id, app_secret, logo, qr_code, status, oem_no )VALUES ( #{dealerId}, #{brandName}, #{wechatName}, #{wechatCode}, #{appId}, #{appSecret}, #{logo}, #{qrCode}, #{status}, upper(replace(uuid(), '-', '')) )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_oem_info SET dealer_id = #{dealerId}, brand_name = #{brandName}, wechat_name = #{wechatName}, wechat_code = #{wechatCode}, app_id = #{appId}, app_secret = #{appSecret}, logo = #{logo}, qr_code = #{qrCode}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_oem_info where dealer_id=#{dealerId} and status=1 limit 0,1
SELECT FROM tb_oem_info where oem_no=#{oemNo} and status=1
SELECT FROM tb_oem_info where id=#{id} and status=1
